system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Staffs)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.hFpBIfoGSvtd1SE0]{Staff Martial Arts}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.74mdgVYCbFnYbGw1]{Staff Specialist}

Benefits

When wielding a long, quarter, or short staff, the Critical
Threat range is 12-18 and any natural roll of a 15-18 is an automatic hit. Additionally, a character can attack up to two targets within their range for the combat point cost of one attack.

Normal

16-18 are automatic hits without this feat.
system.summary: 12-18 crit, 15-18 auto hit, attack two targets with one attack
